author: Morgan Watson
description: Orange, honey, apple and spice laced with Polish Bison grass vodka.
name: Warsaw Cooler
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR honey with vodka in base of shaker until honey dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
